metadata.title: CVE-2024-0805 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Downloads in Google Chrome prior to121.0.6167.85 allowed a remote attacker to perform domain spoofing via acrafted domain name. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
